website_summaries.verdict: With LED and smart lighting prices continuing to fall, $40 feels pretty steep for a single non-connected bulb, even one as unique as this one.
pros: The eye-catching Nanoleaf Bloom uses clever programming to dim without the need for a dimmer
It's also the most efficient 75W replacement LED we've come across
cons: The Nanoleaf's dimming trick isn't as precise as more common methods, and might not add enough functionality to justify the price tag

customer_reviews.text: I bought this bulb for the aesthetic knowing full well it might not work in my light fixture which is connected to a dimmer switch. And it doesn’t work. If you have a dimmer already, you can’t use this bulb.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a few, then I purchased 10 more and now I am going to by another 10 to give to loved ones. This lightbulb is awesome. The color temperature is beautiful, not too yellow like older bulbs and not too cold like many LED's. The dimming feature is sooooo nice!!! I will warn though, if you have a lamp that has multiple levels of output then you will not get the benefit of dimming the bulb. The light switch must have the ability to only turn off and on.

customer_reviews.title: It's a great conversation piece since it has an interesting design and ...
customer_reviews.text: I use the Nanoleaf to provide light in my work area. I am a nightowl and tend to work and read late into the night so the Nanoleaf works well for me since it distributes the bright white light evenly across my desk. It's a great conversation piece since it has an interesting design and would make a excellent gift for those who are energy-conscious. I would recommend this product and buy it again.

product_meta.title: Bloom Dimmable LED Light Bulb, Arctic white
product_meta.description: Color:Arctic WhiteDimmable in regular ON/OFF light fixtures/lamps. Adjust the brightness with your existing ON/OFF switch. Set the mood and save energy! No hardware, no apps, just take the Nanoleaf Bloom out of the box, put it into any fixture and start adjusting the brightness using the light switch that's already there! With our patented technology, we have been able to transform the switching of the light switch into a control signal for our light! With this technology, we have enabled you to dim your lights in light fixtures that were before only able to be 100% on or off. Forget about dimmer switches, get the Nanoleaf Bloom and dim your lights in regular ON/OFF light fixtures or lamps using the existing ON/OFF light switch! Go ahead, grab life by the bulbs. Order your Nanoleaf Bloom bulbs today!

Ultra energy efficient - 10 watt Nanoleaf Bloom replacing the 75 watt A19 bulb, saves you more than $215 within its lifetime
